name: ext_R4_MedicinalProductIndication
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.MedicinalProductIndication for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductIndication from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductIndication|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R3.

element.short: MedicinalProductIndication
element.definition: Indication for the Medicinal Product.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both
